original_title: Portrait de Rosa, à la française
overview: Poetic, delicate, engaging. "Portrait de Rosa, à la française" gently draws you into this passionate love story, with a love text that fits well with the images of Rosa's smiling face. A narrative that recalls the “nouvelle vague” interpreted with today's eyes.
tagline: And I left it all without you having the slightest hunch.
title: Portrait de Rosa, à la française
